p: The synthesized AgNPs were characterized using methods that have been previously described ( Mohanta et al., 2016a). The size range and surface charge (Zeta) of dispersed NPs were determined using a Zeta sizer (Nano ZS90, Malvern Instruments Ltd, Malvern, United Kingdom). Attenuated total reflectance-Fourier transform infrared spectroscopy (ATR-FTIR, Brucker) analysis of spectra within the range of 500–4,000 cm –1 was conducted to determine the role of the phytoconstituents in NPs synthesis. Surface morphology was confirmed by observation of the synthesized AgNPs with a Field emission scanning electron microscope (FE-SEM; Jeol 6480LV JSM microscope, United States) operating at an acceleration voltage of 15 KV.
